Description: Available for 9/1 move in. Large one-bedroom, one bath apartment in a convenient Somerville location. Located .2 miles from Gilman Sq T Stop. Renovated kitchen within the last 2 years, with white cabinets, stove/oven, and refrigerator. Apartment includes 1 off-street parking spot, common laundry, and a large private storage room in the basement. There is also a shared outdoor space in back underneath luscious grape vines with a table and chairs for those warm weather days. Pet friendly with some restrictions. Inquire today!
